import random

def resolve(n, a):
    p = random.randint(0, n-1)
    q = random.randint(0, n-1)
    while p == q:
        q = random.randint(0, n-1)
    a[q] -= a[p]
    return a

def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    while True:
        a = resolve(n, a)
        if a.count(0) == n-1:
            print(a[a.index(max(a))])
            break

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

# input
N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

# sort
A.sort()

# compute
while len(A) > 1:
    A = A[:-2] + [A[-1] - A[-2]]

# output
print(A[0])

def main():
    n = int(input())
    values = sorted(map(int, input().split()))
    last = values.pop(0)
    while len(values) > 0:
        last = max(last - values.pop(0), 1)
    print(last)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import random

def resolve(n, a):
	p = random.randint(0, n-1)
	q = random.randint(0, n-1)
	while p == q:
		q = random.randint(0, n-1)
	a[q] -= a[p]
	return a

def main():
	n = int(input())
	a = list(map(int, input().split()))
	while True:
		a = resolve(n, a)
		if a.count(0) == n-1:
			print(a[a.index(max(a))])
			break

if __name__ == '__main__':
	main()

def main():
    _ = int(input())
    values = sorted(map(int, input().split()))
    last = values.pop()
    while len(values) > 0:
        last = max(last - values.pop(), 1)
    print(last)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
